Prerequisite(s): Three Surging Shark maneuvers
Range: Personal
Target: You
Duration: Stance

Description

You become a dweller of the deep, swift, powerful, unstoppable. None can escape your grasp, nor the bite of your weapons. Whenever you make a melee attack against a creature you may make a second attack using the first attack's modifier with a -5 penalty. This second attack is not considered to be part of a strike, nor does it gain any additional damage from strikes. This second attack does not trigger the eï¬€ect of this stance. Additionally, creatures you hit are automatically locked.
